description: A body of structured information describing some topic(s) of interest.

headline.description: Headline that describes this dataset (max. 110 characters).

abstract.description: Short description that summarizes this dataset (max. 200 words; no references).

dataDescriptorMaintext.description: Extensive description of this dataset including references to relevant publications.

changeLog.description: Record of all notable changes made to this dataset compared to it's previous version.

license.description: License document that applies to this dataset.

datePublished.description: Date (actual or intended) of first broadcast/publication of this dataset.

conditionsOfAccess.description: Conditions that affect the availability of this dataset.

doi.description: Persistent and interoperable Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for this content.

contributors.description: List of contributors of this dataset.

ethicsApproval.description: Characteristics of the existing ethics approval.

isNewVersionOf.description: Indicates that this content is a new edition (modified or updated) of a previously released content.

isPartOf.description: Lists larger research projects in which context this content was created.

wasPerformedOn.description: Lists subjects and/or tissue samples of this study.

hasFocusOn.description: Lists the foci (study target, temporal subject information) of this study.

isDescribedBy.description: Lists publications/sources or files that contain a descriptive documentation of this content.

isBasedOn.description: Lists the publications/sources from which this content is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.

usedMethodsAndOrParadigms.description: Lists the methods and/or paradigms used to produce this content.
